showSupportedGameNote.name: Show Supported Game Note
showSupportedGameNote.description: When enabled, a notification appears when joining a supported game mode.

hideLeaderboard.name: Hide Default Leaderboard
hideLeaderboard.description: Hides the default Leaderboard in the scoreboard on the right side. Tipp: You can enable a custom Scoreboard in the widget section.

disableDefaultBackpackHotkey.name: Disable Default Backpack Hotkey
disableDefaultBackpackHotkey.description: Deactivates the default hotkey (right mouse button) for the backpack. The backpack can still be opened via /backpack or the custom backpack hotkey.

backpackHotkey.name: Custom Backpack Hotkey
backpackHotkey.description: Sets a custom hotkey to open the backpack. This hotkey can be used to open the backpack ingame at any time, even if you do not hold it in your hand.

welcome.title: Welcome to %s
welcome.text: The KlickMich.net addon supports this game mode.

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.text: This setting has a cooldown. Please wait a moment before changing it again.

disable_while_ingame.title: Caution!
disable_while_ingame.text: Disabling the KlickMich addon while playing a supported game mode can cause unexpected behaviour! To fix problems, enable the addon and join the server again.

leaderboard_possibly_not_changed.title: KlickMich.NET
leaderboard_possibly_not_changed.text: This change may not take effect until after this round.

lineBreakAfterKey.name: Line Break after Key
lineBreakAfterKey.description: Inserts a line break in the first line, which moves the first line of the leaderboard down one line.

klickmichnet.name: KlickMich.net
klickmichnet.description: Widgets related to KlickMich.net or GameModes of KlickMich.net.
